islam-prefs-talkpage: Link to the Islam talk page which is shown before the preview link in skin preferences. See T307113 for more information.
islam-search-poweredby: Label for the current search backend powering the search suggestion
islam-search-keyhint-exit: Keyboard hint for the key to exit search
islam-search-keyhint-open: Keyboard hint for the key to open search
islam-search-keyhint-select: Keyboard hint for the key to select item
islam-actions-more-toggle: Tooltip of more page actions menu toggle
islam-page-info-credits: Label for the article credits message
islam-page-info-lastmod: Label for the last modified message
islam-footer-desc: Default text for the site footer decription.
islam-footer-tagline: Default text for the site footer tagline.
islam-action-addsection:
Used in the Islam skin. See for example {{canonicalurl:Talk:Main_Page|useskin=vector}}
{{Identical|Add topic}}. Same as vector-action-addsection in Vector skin.
islam-jumptotop: Label for link to jump to top of page
islam-search-advancedsearch: Label for AdvancedSearch button in search actions
islam-search-fulltext: Label for fulltext button in search actions
islam-search-mediasearch: Label for MediaSearch button in search actions
islam-search-editpage: Label for edit and create page button in search actions
islam-search-empty-desc: Helper text in the search suggestion when there are no search query
islam-search-noresults-title: Title in the search suggestion when there are no search results
islam-search-noresults-desc: Description in the search suggestion when there are no search results
islam-share: Label for button to share the current page
islam-share-copied: Message to notify users that the current URL is copied to the clipboard
islam-tagline-ns-talk: Tagline for pages in talk namespace
islam-tagline-ns-project: Tagline for pages in project namespace
islam-tagline-ns-file: Tagline for pages in file namespace
islam-tagline-ns-mediawiki: Tagline for pages in MediaWiki namespace
islam-tagline-ns-template: Tagline for pages in template namespace
islam-tagline-ns-help: Tagline for pages in help namespace
islam-tagline-ns-category: Tagline for pages in category namespace
islam-tagline-user-regdate: Label for registration date in taglines on userpages
islam-theme-name: Heading label for setting that allows you to change theme.
islam-theme-os-label: Label for automatic theme (which respects any operating system setting).
islam-theme-exclusion-notice: Text that informs you that the page is always in light/day mode.
islam-feature-autohide-navigation-0-labe: Label for turning off automatically hide navigation
islam-feature-autohide-navigation-1-labe: Label for turning on automatically hide navigation
islam-feature-pure-black-name: Label for pure black mode in dark theme.
islam-feature-pure-black-0-label: Label for turning off pure black mode
islam-feature-pure-black-1-label: Label for turning on pure black mode
islam-feature-custom-font-size-small-lab: Label for small font size. An adjective that describes "text" ({{msg-mw|Islam-feature-custom-font-size-name}}).
islam-feature-custom-font-size-standard-: Label for standard font size. An adjective that describes "text" ({{msg-mw|Islam-feature-custom-font-size-name}})
islam-feature-custom-font-size-large-lab: Label for large font size. An adjective that describes "text" ({{msg-mw|Islam-feature-custom-font-size-name}}).
islam-feature-custom-font-size-xlarge-la: Label for extra large font size. An adjective that describes "text" ({{msg-mw|Islam-feature-custom-font-size-name}}).
islam-feature-custom-width-standard-labe: Label for standard page width. An adjective that describes "text" ({{msg-mw|Islam-feature-custom-width-name}}).
islam-feature-custom-width-wide-label: Label for wide page width. An adjective that describes "text" ({{msg-mw|Islam-feature-custom-width-name}}).
islam-feature-custom-width-full-label: Label for full page width. An adjective that describes "text" ({{msg-mw|Islam-feature-custom-width-name}}).
islam-user-info-text-anon: Description in the user menu when user is not logged in.
islam-user-info-text-temp: Description in the user menu when user is using a temporary account.
islam-user-info-edits-label: Label for the edit count in the user info
islam-user-info-joined-label: Label for the registration date in the user info
islam-command-palette-heading-recent: Label for the recently searched results in the command palette
islam-command-palette-heading-related: Label for the related results in the command palette
islam-command-palette-keyhint-enter-sele: Keyboard hint for the key to select an item in the command palette
islam-command-palette-keyhint-enter-open: Keyboard hint for the key to open a link in the command palette
islam-command-palette-keyhint-enter-sear: Keyboard hint for the key to perform a search in the command palette
islam-command-palette-keyhint-navigate: Keyboard hint for the key to navigate in the command palette
islam-command-palette-keyhint-exit: Keyboard hint for the key to exit the command palette
islam-command-palette-keyhint-actions: Keyboard hint for the key to select an action in an item in the command palette
islam-command-palette-keyhint-return: Keyboard hint for the key to return to search in the command palette
islam-command-palette-type-page: Label for the page type of the result in the command palette
islam-command-palette-type-action: Label for the action type of the result in the command palette
islam-command-palette-type-namespace: Label for the namespace type of the result in the command palette
islam-command-palette-type-command: Label for the command type of the result in the command palette
islam-command-palette-type-special-page: Label for the special page type of the result in the command palette
islam-command-palette-type-menu-item: Label for the menu item type of the result in the command palette
islam-command-palette-type-user: Label for the user type of the result in the command palette
islam-command-palette-command-ns-descrip: Description for the namespace command in the command palette
islam-command-palette-command-action-des: Description for the action command in the command palette
islam-command-palette-command-user-descr: Description for the user command in the command palette
islam-command-palette-queryaction-fullte: Description for the fulltext search in the command palette
islam-command-palette-queryaction-media-: Description for the media search in the command palette
islam-command-palette-queryaction-page-e: Description for the page edit action in the command palette
islam-command-palette-tip-commands: Tip for the commands in the command palette
islam-command-palette-tip-users: Tip for the users in the command palette
islam-command-palette-tip-namespace: Tip for the namespace in the command palette
islam-command-palette-tip-templates: Tip for the templates in the command palette
islam-command-palette-tip-actions: Tip for the actions in the command palette
